entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
